Interface EditorState

All Known Subinterfaces:
EditorStateManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
BusinessEditorState, BusinessEditorState.DefaultState, BusinessEditorState.EditedImage, BusinessEditorState.FilterPending, BusinessEditorState.ImageLoadedState, BusinessEditorState.LoadingState, StateApplication
public interface EditorState
Interface defining the possible states and operations of the image editor. Provides methods to query the current state and determine which operations are allowed in that state.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    areChangesPending()
    Checks if there are unsaved changes to the current image.

    canAddFilter()
    Checks if a new filter can be added to the filter pipeline.

    canExport()
    Checks if the current image can be exported to a different format.

    Checks if the current image can be saved with a new name/path.
    boolean
    isRefreshRequired()
    Checks if the UI needs to be refreshed to reflect recent changes.

  • Method Details

    • canApplyFilters

      boolean canApplyFilters()
      Checks if filters can be applied to the current image.
      Returns:
      true if filters can be applied, false otherwise

    • canSave

      boolean canSave()
      Checks if the current image can be saved.
      Returns:
      true if the image can be saved, false otherwise

    • canSaveAs

      boolean canSaveAs()
      Checks if the current image can be saved with a new name/path.
      Returns:
      true if the image can be saved as, false otherwise

    • canAddFilter

      boolean canAddFilter()
      Checks if a new filter can be added to the filter pipeline.
      Returns:
      true if a filter can be added, false otherwise

    • canExport

      boolean canExport()
      Checks if the current image can be exported to a different format.
      Returns:
      true if the image can be exported, false otherwise

    • isRefreshRequired

      boolean isRefreshRequired()
      Checks if the UI needs to be refreshed to reflect recent changes.
      Returns:
      true if a refresh is required, false otherwise

    • areChangesPending

      boolean areChangesPending()
      Checks if there are unsaved changes to the current image.
      Returns:
      true if there are pending changes, false otherwise
